thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com
thread.title: Paula Dalton-Kirby

author: Paula Dalton-Kirby
title: Paula Dalton-Kirby
text:
I found the ECDL course to be very informative. The website is easy to move around and the interaction was excellent. There was a large selection of information to learn at a perfect level.
Customer services was great. The only slight downside was obtaining a certificate for my boss at work. The course does not provide you with a certificate of completion however there is the option to purchase one if you wish. I am still waiting to hear back.
Would recommend the course.
